title: Taiwanese staff to leave Hong Kong office in 'one China' row
content:
1. Taiwanese staff to leave Hong Kong office in 'one China' row  Reuters
  2. Taiwan to ‘adjust’ Hong Kong office operations in ‘one China’ row  Al Jazeera English
  3. Top U.S General Dismisses Possibility of Near-term Chinese Military Invasion Of Taiwan, Says Beijing Currently Lacks Capability To Annex  Yahoo India News
  4. Why is US repeatedly speculating over when mainland will reunify Taiwan militarily?: Global Times editorial  Global Times
  5. Taiwan security needs thinking outside the 'military box'  East Asia Forum
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 台湾人スタッフが「一つの中国」の問題で香港オフィスから退去
在 "一个中国 "的争论中，台湾员工将离开香港办事处
在 "一箇中國 "的爭論中，臺灣員工將離開香港辦事處
